item.title: Making gifs in R with `gganimate`
item.description: Introduction Package Setup Data Forecasting Generate data to plot Figure Introduction Since I’m writing R code to make certain figures for this website, I thought I could go ahead and annotate some of it in R markdown to serve as blog posts. Package Setup library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.3.2 ## ✔ tibble 2.1.3 ✔ dplyr 0.
